body.p:
Smithland Augst /14th/64
His Execnely T. E. Bramlet
Governor of Kentuck
Dr Sir

I had a prisoner in my Jail by the name of John Robertson for murder, and he escaped on the 8 of August and he has not been hard from since his discription about 40 years Old wait about 150lb hight about 5 fee 10 Inches fair complection Black hair and blue Eyes, has Whiskers & Mustash, bad Teath and Slow spoken, dress dark brown Jeanes Coat vest & Pants, low black Hat and heavy Boots

Respectfully yours
T, A, Leeper
J, L, C
Livingston Co
Ky

P S he was put in the Jaile for Killing am Man at Marion Crittenden Co
Ky
